Class Documentation

class Driver

Base class for driver.

Public Functions

Driver(ros::NodeHandle nh, std::string ip_addr, unsigned port, std::string topic_name)

Driver constructor.

Parameters:

  • nh – [in] Ros handle node.

  • ip_addr – [in] Ip address of the LiDar device.

  • port – [in] Network port of the LiDar device.

  • topic_name – [in] Name of the topic for pointcloud v2 messages.

void poll()

Polling function for the one packet from the LiDar.

void poll_full()

Polling function for the 18 packets from the LiDar.
